items.name: core.number
items.label: 核数
items.follower: The number of CPU to computing

data.doc:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<descriptor id="SIMCFD" filled="true">
	<options name="base.parameter" info="Base Parameter" id="basic" narrow="false">
		<option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.text" required="false" name="job.name" label="Job Name" id="JOB_NAME" hidden="false"></option>
        <option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.list" required="false" name="queue" label="Queue" id="QUEUE" hidden="false" defaultValue="normal">
            <option selected="false" id="simcfd_high">simcfd_high</option>
            <option selected="true" id="simcfd_low">simcfd_low</option>
        </option>
		<option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.list" required="false" name="core.number" label="Core" id="NCPU" hidden="false" helpText="" follower="The number of CPU to computing" defaultValue="">
            <option selected="false" id="16">16</option>
            <option selected="true" id="32">32</option>
        </option>
		<option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.password" required="false" name="windows.password" label="Windows password" id="WIN_PWD" hidden="false" minLength="6" maxLength="30"></option>
	</options>
	
	<options name="application.parameter" info="Application Parameters" id="app" narrow="true">
		<option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.list" required="false" name="solution.mode" label="SolutionMode" id="SOLUTIONMODE" hidden="false" helpText="" follower="" defaultValue="">
            <option selected="true" id="steady state">Steady State</option>
            <option selected="false" id="transient">Transient</option>
        </option>
        <option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.list" required="false" name="version" label="Version" id="SIMCFDVERSION" hidden="false" helpText="" follower="" defaultValue="">
            <option selected="false" id="2013">2013</option>
            <option selected="true" id="2014">2014</option>
        </option>
	</options>

	<options name="inputfile.parameter" info="Input Files" id="file" narrow="false">
		<option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.remotelocate.file" width="42" required="false" name="input.file" label="Input File" id="INPUT_FILE" hidden="false"></option>
	</options>
</descriptor>
